thread.title: Manchester United stars enjoy a few days off as Red Devils' attention turns to Saturday's clash with Watford
thread.title_full: Manchester United stars enjoy a few days off as Red Devils' attention turns to Saturday's clash with Watford

author: Liam Corless
title: Manchester United stars enjoy a few days off as Red Devils' attention turns to Saturday's clash with Watford
text:
Manchester United stars enjoy a few days off as Red Devils' attention turns to Saturday's clash with Watford United host Walter Mazzarri's Hornets on Saturday looking to continue their assault on a top-four spot Share Matteo Darmian used his time off to return to his native Italy (Photo: FameFlynet) Share Get Manchester United FC   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
With no midweek game this week, Manchester United's players have been enjoying a bit of downtime on the back of Sunday's victory over Leicester. 
Manager Jose Mourinho afforded his players a couple of days off following Sunday's 3-0 win away to the Premier League champions. 
Full-back Matteo Darmian took the opportunity to return to Italy and he was snapped in Milan with fiancee Francesca Cormanni. 
The Italian defender donned a white T-shirt, blue jeans and a beanie hat as he entered a Gucci store in the city alongside Miss Cormanni. Darmian was spotted shopping at Gucci in Milan with fiancee Francesca Cormanni (Photo: FameFlynet) Miss Cormanni puts her hat on as she exits Gucci alongside Darmian (Photo: FameFlynet) The happy couple grinned as they walked down the street (Photo: FameFlynet) Read More 
Midfielder Ander Herrera, meanwhile, travelled south from Manchester to spend some time in London with girlfriend Isabel Collardo and the pair's baby daughter. 
The Spaniard shared a picture of the trio together at Piccadilly Circus with his 2.6million Instagram followers. 
Juan Mata stayed a little closer to home as he took a trip to the Whitworth Art Gallery in Manchester. 
He shared a picture of Andy Warhol's 1986 'Self-Portrait' with his 4.3million Instagram followers. Read More
